description: The charismatic Cuban with a horseshoe mustache and mesmerizing windup pitched the Red Sox to the brink of a World Series championship and pitched himself to the doorstep of the Hall of Fame.
title: Luis Tiant, charismatic Cuban who pitched the Red Sox to the brink of a title, dies at 83

description: Vice President Harris is criticizing Trump over the reported shipment, which is detailed in a new book by the journalist Bob Woodward. The president's campaign has denied the reporting.
title: Trump secretly sent Putin COVID-19 tests during pandemic shortage, a new book reports

description: Crocs — those colorful clog like shoes - are popular with many kids and teens. But doctors say foot problems could be possible if they're worn constantly. Here's what to know if your kid wears Crocs.
title: Lots of kids wear Crocs, but are they bad for young feet?

description: In swing states like Georgia, growing numbers of South Asians could make a difference this election. So how do they feel about the woman some call "Lotus POTUS?"
title: Some Indian American Democrats see themselves in Harris. Others see the limits

description: A Brazilian Supreme Court justice authorized the restoration of the social media platform's service in Brazil, over a month after its nationwide shutdown, according to a court document.
title: Musk's X to be reinstated in Brazil after complying with Supreme Court demands

description: Azerbaijan has carried out an “escalating crackdown” on government critics and activists over the past two years, according to Human Rights Watch and Freedom Now.
title: Azerbaijan’s human-rights record is under fire as it prepares to host UN climate talks

description: Communities along Florida's west coast are bracing for a life-threatening storm. Many residents are taking Milton very seriously, heeding calls to evacuate to higher ground. Others are staying put.
title: Floridians reconsider staying home as Hurricane Milton edges closer

description: Researchers found that two individuals of a type of comb jelly can fuse and become one with a shared nervous system and digestive system — which has implications for animal regeneration and immune systems.
title: A jellyfish with a superpower - it can fuse with another and become one

description: Climate change hasn't increased the total number of hurricanes hitting the U.S., but it is making dangerous storms more common.
title: Are hurricanes getting worse? Here’s what you need to know

description: Former President Donald Trump has made several claims about FEMA's disaster response. NPR has fact-checked them ahead of Hurricane Milton. And, how you can turn climate anxiety into collective action.
title: Fact-checking lies about FEMA funding. And, turn climate anxiety into action

description: After his father was killed by Israeli settlers raiding his village in the central West Bank, he says, 15-year-old Noor Assi sometimes envies other teens, but says, "I have a family to take care of."
title: One boy's story shows the impact of rising Israeli settler violence in the West Bank

description: A new report finds that LGBTQ+ women in the U.S. experience high rates of trauma, mental illness, and other health conditions. And they're less likely to seek medical care.
title: LGBTQ+ women face disproportionate rates of mental health issues and barriers to care

description: John Hopfield and Geoffrey Hinton were awarded the Nobel Prize in physics Tuesday for discoveries and inventions that formed the building blocks of machine learning.
title: Nobel Prize in physics awarded to 2 scientists for discoveries in machine learning

description: A new study finds that Americans have adopted generative AI faster than personal computers and the internet. Does this mean we're about to see a long-awaited increase in productivity growth?
title: Americans are using AI at fairly high rates. What does this mean for the economy?

description: The government contends that ghost guns kits count as a firearm under a 1968 law. But those challenging the rule contend “a kit of parts is not a weapon.”
title: Can ghost guns be regulated as firearms? The Supreme Court will decide

description: Harris has already appeared on 60 Minutes and the popular podcast Call Her Daddy. Next up, appearances on The View, The Late Show with Stephen Colbert and The Howard Stern Show.
title: Harris is trying to reach new voters with a media blitz both traditional — and not

description: Harris is using ABC’s The View – a popular daytime television talk show — to unveil a new pledge squarely aimed at women who take care of aging parents as well as their own kids.
title: Harris proposes help for the 'sandwich generation': a Medicare benefit for home care

description: More than half of young adults feel anxious, angry and powerless over climate change, a recent survey found. But there are ways to help turn that distress around. Here's how to give them a try.
title: Here's how to turn climate change anxiety into action

description: Most of the people who live in Poplar, N.C, are seniors. One priority is securing propane and kerosene heaters to keep them warm when it turns cold.
title: This mountain hamlet hit by Helene flooding preps for a winter without power

description: Communities in Florida are bracing for the impact of Hurricane Milton, which quickly went intensified from a tropical storm to a powerful, life-threatening hurricane much faster than predicted.
title: Hurricane Milton poses an 'extremely serious threat' as it barrels toward Florida

description: Opposition parties boycotted the election, calling it a sham amid a deteriorating political climate and authoritarian drift in the birthplace of the Arab Spring more than a decade ago.
title: Tunisia's President Saied wins reelection after cracking down on the opposition
